named-query.name: READ_ADDRESS_BY_USER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.user.id = :userId ORDER BY address.id

named-query.name: READ_ADDRESS_BY_USER_ID_AND_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.user.id = :userId AND address.addressName = :addressName

named-query.name: READ_ADDRESS_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Address address WHERE address.id = :addressId
